key.name: prefer-dark-theme
key.description: Whether to use the dark variant of the theme

key.name: default-quality
key.description: Default quality selected when opening a stream

key.name: oauth-token
key.description: OAuth token used to authenticate all requests to the Twitch API. Note that if you want to "logout" then you can just set the OAuth token to an empty string

key.name: user-name
key.description: User name that is used in conjunction with the OAuth token to authenticate to the Twitch API. Is also used to login to IRC and other Twitch services.

key.name: user-id
key.description: User id that is used in conjunction with the OAuth token to authenticate to the Twitch API.

key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Whether to show notifications when channels start streaming
